vehicles.description: A white sedan parked on the right side of the road, facing the same direction as the ego car
vehicles.explanation: The parked sedan could potentially obstruct the lane or move off without warning, necessitating vigilance and readiness to react from the ego car.

vulnerable_road_users.description: A group of pedestrians standing on the sidewalk to the right of the ego car
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The presence of pedestrians near the roadway might lead to possible pedestrian crossings, requiring the ego car to monitor their movements closely and be prepared to stop.

traffic lights.description: No traffic lights visible in the scene
traffic lights.explanation: The absence of visible traffic lights indicates there are no light-controlled intersections affecting the ego car's immediate driving decisions.

barriers.description: White and blue barriers on the right side, marking the boundary of the pedestrian area
barriers.explanation: These barriers separate the road from the pedestrian zone, helping to guide the driving path and reduce the risk of pedestrian-related incidents.

other objects.description: A bus is stopped at a bus stop on the right, partially obstructing the rightmost lane
other objects.explanation: The stopped bus may mask pedestrians who could emerge and cross the road, increasing the need for caution.

general_perception.description and explanation:
The image reveals various road users and objects affecting driving behavior. There is a white sedan parked on the right side of the road, facing the same direction as the ego car, which could obstruct the lane or move off without warning, necessitating vigilance from the ego car. A group of pedestrians is standing on the sidewalk to the right of the ego car, meaning potential pedestrian crossings which require the ego car to monitor their movements closely and be prepared to stop. 

No traffic lights are visible in the scene, indicating no light-controlled intersections influencing the immediate driving decisions of the ego car. White and blue barriers on the right side mark the boundary of the pedestrian area, guiding the driving path and reducing pedestrian-related risk. Additionally, a bus is stopped at a bus stop on the right, partially obstructing the rightmost lane, which may mask pedestrians who could emerge and cross the road, thereby increasing the need for caution.

1.description and explanation: This object is a pedestrian, specifically showing one person standing in the scene. Pedestrians are individual human road users, often unpredictable in their actions. Drivers must pay close attention to them, since they have the right of way in many traffic situations, especially in crossing zones without traffic lights. In this situation, the ego car may need to slow down or stop until the pedestrian clears the area to avoid a collision and ensure safety.

2.description and explanation: This object is a traffic cone, a brightly colored conical marker commonly used to manage traffic flow, provide directions, or designate no-entry zones on roads and other areas. The presence of this cone in the scene indicates a temporary road condition such as construction, a detour, or possible hazards. The ego vehicle should maneuver carefully around the cone, maintaining awareness of possible changes in the direction of traffic or unexpected obstacles nearby.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a moderate speed and keep a watchful eye on the parked sedan and stopped bus for any signs of movement. Be prepared to yield to pedestrians that may enter the roadway, especially around the bus stop. Ensure the ego car maintains a safe distance from the right side barriers and parked vehicles to allow for evasive maneuvers if necessary.
